description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 17/03623 (Enlargement of roof and formation of two rear dormer windows and two front velux windows; enlargement of existing rear closet wing, side infill extension at lower ground floor level, lowering of lower ground floor, enlargement of lower ground floor level front light well window; and provision of gate and access steps into front lightwell) to addition of a small section of retaining wall within rear lower ground floor light well: replacement of proposed staircase within front light well with a fixed ladder to improve daylight to lower ground floor front room: rearrangement of planting areas in rear garden to provide same planted area but in a different configuration
